TERRENCE NAPIER AND MOHAN RAMACHANDRAN
Abstract. Simple approaches to the proofs of the L2 Castelnuovo-de Franchis theorem
and the cup product lemma which give new versions are developed. For example, suppose
1 and 2 are two linearly independent closed holomorphic 1-forms on a bounded geometry
connected complete Kahler manifold X with 2 in L2. According to a version of the L2
Castelnuovo-de Franchis theorem obtained in this paper, if 1  2  0, then there exists
a surjective proper holomorphic mapping of X onto a Riemann surface for which 1 and
2 are pull-backs. Previous versions required both forms to be in L2.
